st: Nazrein Meri Kahin Thak Na Jaayein,
s:
Nazrein Meri Kahin Thak Na Jaayein,
Bewafa Tera Intezaar Karte Karte,

Yeh Jaan Yun Hi Nikal Na Jaaye,
Tum Se Ishq Ka Izhaar Karte Karte…

st: Tum Hi Tum Tadpo Na Hamein Tadpaao,
s:
Tum Hi Tum Tadpo Na Hamein Tadpaao,
Do Roohein Milne Do Ek Jaan Ban Jaao,

Deti Ho Meri Bhool Ki Itni Badi Saja,
Thukra Ke Mera Pyar Na Ban Jaao Bewafa…

st: Bhale Hi Raah Chalton Ka Daaman Tham Le,
s:
Bhale Hi Raah Chalton Ka Daaman Tham Le,
Magar Mere Pyar Ko Bhi Tu Pahchan Le,

Kitna Intezaar Kiya Hai Tere Ishq Mein,
Jara Yeh Dill Ki Betaabi Tu Jaan Le..

st: Chaahat Ke Yeh Kaise Afsane Huye,
s:
Chaahat Ke Yeh Kaise Afsane Huye,
Khud Nazron Mein Apni Begane Huye,

Kisi Bhi Riste Ka Khayal Nahi Mujhe,
Ishq Mein Tere Is Kadar Diwaane Huye….

st: Itna Pyaar Na Kar, Ke, Ishq Bhi,
s:
Itna Pyaar Na Kar, Ke, Ishq Bhi,
Ro Padega Teri Wafa Dekh Kar,

Tum Milo Na Milo Par,
Rab Zaroor Jal Uthega, Tumhara Junoon Dekh Kar….

st: Junun E Iahq,
s:
Junun E Iahq,
Nahi Raas Aaya Hamein,

Jab Bhi Dekha Aaina,
Aks Unka Hi Najar Aaya Hamein,

Tadpate Dil Ke Byaan Karein Kaise ?

Jab Bhi Kureda Ghavo Ko,
Dard Unka Hi Ubhar Aaya….

st: Ishq Chhupta Hai Chhupane Se Kahan,
s:
Ishq Chhupta Hai Chhupane Se Kahan,
Yeh Khud Be Khud Samne Aata Hai,

Nahi Bachta Is Se Koi Bhi Kabhi,
Yeh Sab Ko Hi Bada Tadpata Hai…

st: Tere Jaane Ke Baad Sanam Mere,
s:
Tere Jaane Ke Baad Sanam Mere,
Sochta Hun Ke Kaise Jiyunga Main,

Tujhse Kiya Hai Isi Liye Wada,
Yeh Judai Ka Zahar Bhi Piyunga Main….

st: Tere Ishq Mein Sab Kuchh Luta Baitha,
s:
Tere Ishq Mein Sab Kuchh Luta Baitha,
Main Toh Zindagi Bhi Apni Ganva Baitha,

Ab Jeene Ki Tamanna Na Rahi Baki,
Saare Armaan Main Apne Dafna Baitha…

st: Yeh Rog Ishq Ka Bahut Bura Hai Dosto,
s:
Yeh Rog Ishq Ka Bahut Bura Hai Dosto,
Aap Is Rog Se Khud Ko Bacha Lena,

Agar Hansi Koi Najrein Milana Bhi Chahae,
Toh Aap Najron Ko Apni Hata Lena…

st: Hamein Toh Rog Laga Diya Ishq Ka,
s:
Hamein Toh Rog Laga Diya Ishq Ka,
Magar Door Khade Woh Muskurate Hain,

Paas Aane Ke Liye Bhi Kah Diya,
Aur Khud Hi Ab Door Huye Jaate Hain…

st: Tere Saath Itne Bahut Se Din,
s:
Tere Saath Itne Bahut Se Din,
Toh Palak Jhapkate Gujar Gaye,

Huyi Sham Khel Hi Khel Mein,
Gayi Raat Bat Hi Baat Mein,

Koi Ishq Hai Ke Akela,
Ret Ji Shal Odh Ke Chal Diya,

st: Apne College Mein Bahut Magroor Jo Mashoor Hai,
s:
Apne College Mein Bahut Magroor Jo Mashoor Hai,
Dil Mera Kahta Hai Us Ladki Mein Hai Chahat Bahut,

Unke Chehre Chand Taaron Ki Tarah Roshan Huye,
Jin Garibon Ke Yahan Husn E Kifayat Hai Bahut,

Hum Se Ho Sakti Nahin Duniya Ki Duniya Dariyan,
Ishq Ki Deewar Ke Shaaye Mein Rahat Hai Bahut,

Dhoop Ki Chadar Mere Suraj Se Kahna Bhej De,
Gurbaton Ka Dour Hai Jaadon Ki Musibat Hai Bahut,

Un Andheron Mein Jahan Sahmi Huyi Thi Yeh Jamin,
Raat Se Tanha Lada Jugnu Mein Himmat Hai Bahut…

st: Paanv Toh Bahar Nikalo Raaste Kitane Toh Hain,
s:
Paanv Toh Bahar Nikalo Raaste Kitane Toh Hain,
Chotiyan Manjilein Apne Honsale Itne Toh Hain,

Ek Unke Ishare Par Nahin Chalta Yeh Chaman,
Hamare Rutbe Bhi Kam Se Kam Udhar Ke Toh Hain,

Mousam Ke Karwaa Rukte Hain Aksar Is Jagah,
Gahri Udhi Ghatiyan Aur Janglaat Ghane Toh Hain,

Khas Kuchh Unmaad Chalne Ke Liye Na Chahiye,
Najar Mein Kuchh Pyar Muthi Bhar Bhune Chane Toh Hain…

st: Aashiqui Bhi Dosto Kya Classical Sangeet Thi
s:
Aashiqui Bhi Dosto Kya Classical Sangeet Thi
Raag To Ohi Jaane Kya Tha, Jaane Kya Gaate Rahe

Zindagi Bhar Ishq Ka Izhaar Karne Ke Liye
Voh Bhi Haqlaate Rahe Aur Hum Bhi Haqlaate Rahe…

st: Aashiqui Bhi Dosto Kya Classical Sangeet Thi
s:
Aashiqui Bhi Dosto Kya Classical Sangeet Thi
Raag To Ohi Jaane Kya Tha, Jaane Kya Gaate Rahe

Zindagi Bhar Ishq Ka Izhaar Karne Ke Liye
Voh Bhi Haqlaate Rahe Aur Hum Bhi Haqlaate Rahe…



Abhi Toh Door Tak Sath Sath Chalna Hai,
Vaise Hain Humsafar Par Chalti Unki Anban Bhi,

Sath Hardam Nahin Rah Sakte Chahne Wale,
Ishq Ke Sath Dard Aur Sihran Bhi,

Bhari Barsat Badlon Ne De Diya Dokha,
Sukhi Nadiyo Ke Sath Pyase Ujde Upvan Bhi,

Husn Maasum Hai Aur Surten Bholi Bhali,
Toot Jaate Hain Kabhi Dil Bhi Aur Darpan Bhi…

st: Isko Kaleje Se,
s:
Isko Kaleje Se,
Maine Jo Laga Rakha Hai,
Dard Ne Paayi,
Mere Seene Mein Rahat Kaisi,

st: Teg Farhaad Ne Bekar Sambhala, Eh Ishq,
s:
Teg Farhaad Ne Bekar Sambhala, Eh Ishq,
Kam Banta, Jo Jara Dil Ko Sambhala Hota…

st: Tumhaare Din Hain Kyamat Uthaye Firane Ke,
s:
Tumhaare Din Hain Kyamat Uthaye Firane Ke,
Tumhaari Umar Hai Naajo Ada Ke Aane Ki,

st: Manjur Kisko Hai Ke Uthaye Bala E Ishq,
s:
Manjur Kisko Hai Ke Uthaye Bala E Ishq,
Jab Sar Pe Aa Pade Toh Kaho Koi Kya Kare,

st: Mil Gayi Bekhudi Eh Shok Se Rahat Kaisi,
s:
Mil Gayi Bekhudi Eh Shok Se Rahat Kaisi,
Ho Gayi Dono Jahan Se Mujhe Fursat Kaisi,

Ishq Ne Di Hain Duayen Dame Rahlat Kaisi,
Mujhse Gale Mil Mil Ke Royi Hai Hasrat Kaisi,

Banda Chahe J O Khudayi Koi Mil Sakti Hai,
Log Kismat Ko Liye Firte Hain Kismat Kaisi,

Dost Ik Rang Jo Kahin Kabhi Mil Baithte Hain,
Lutf Ke Saath Gujar Jati Hai Sohbat Kaisi….

st: Main Hu Fauji Tu Manmoji,
s:
Main Hu Fauji Tu Manmoji,
Main Hu Fauji Are Tu Manmoji,

Khub Mile Diwane Do,
Ji Khub Mile Diwane Do,

Is Mitti Ke Saath Jude Hain,
Farj Mohabbat Roji Roti,

Dil Ke Andar Ishq Ka Jajba,
Kya Jalwa Kya Parda Jalwa Tera Jalwa…

st: Yeh Sabab Kya Hai Jidhar Jata Hun,
s:
Yeh Sabab Kya Hai Jidhar Jata Hun,
Saamne Teri Gali Aati Hai,

Kya Adam Se Hamein Aane Ki Khusi,
Mout Thi Saath Lagi Aati Hai,

Tujhko Eh Guncha O Gull Isi Tarah,
Khilkhila Kar Bhi Hansi Aati Hai,

Mujrime Ishq Huye Tum Eh Daag,
Ab Wahan Se Talbi Aati Hai

st: Rahega Ishq Tera Khak Mein Mila Ke Mujhe,
s:
Rahega Ishq Tera Khak Mein Mila Ke Mujhe,
Ki Ibtida Mein Huye Ranj Inteha Ke Mujhe,

Hajume Naaj Mein Gir Gayi Duhayi Di Dil Ne,
Yeh Loot Lete Hain Tanha Garib Pa Ke Mujhe,

Sarik Mehro Wafa Mein Kami Kiye Hi Bani,
Khyal Tha Woh Na Pachhtaye Aajma Ke Mujhe,

Bagair Mout Ke Kis Tarah Koi Marta Hai,
Yaki Na Aaye Toh Woh Dekh Jaaye Aa Ke Mujhe…

st: Mite Huvon Ka Hamesha Nishan Rahta Hai,
s:
Mite Huvon Ka Hamesha Nishan Rahta Hai,
Bakka Ke Gham Mein Fanaa Aur Kon Hai Main Hu,

Khayal E Yaar Se Kahta Haimujhe Akele Mein,
Tera Dost Bata Kon Hai Main Hu Aur Kon Hai,

Hijab Mujh Pe Haya Mujh Pe Aar Hai Mujh Pe,
Is Anjuman Mein Naya Aur Kon Hai Main Hu,

Woh Daag Jisko Gukbaag E Iahq Kahte Hain,
Bahare Range Wafa Aur Kon Hai Main Hu…

st: Kam Rukne Ka Nahin Hai Eh Dile Nadan Koi,
s:
Kam Rukne Ka Nahin Hai Eh Dile Nadan Koi,
Khud Ba Khud Rab Se Ho Jaayega Saama Koi,

Bechta Hu Jo Kharide Mere Armna Koi,
Muft Deta Hu Agar Maan Le Ahsaan Koi,

Ishq Jisko Na Ho Aisa Na Ho Insa Koi,
Aage Takdeer Hai Khush Ho Ki Paseman Koi,

Jab Se Iaq Se Touba Najar Aate Hain Yeh Khwab,
Khinchta Hai Koi Daaman Toh Garebaan Koi…

st: Isq Mein Aansuo Ke Taar Gale Ke Haar Hite Hain,
s:
Isq Mein Aansuo Ke Taar Gale Ke Haar Hite Hain,
Unhe Kab Chain Aata Hai Jo Isq Ke Beemar Hote Hain,

Eh Isq Tune Mujhe Giraya Hai Chah Mein,
Sabr O Karar Cheen Liya Bas Ek Nigah Mein,

Zindagi Ko Agar Jina Hai Jeene Walo,
Kabhi Mohabbat Na Karna Aalas Mein Rahne Walo….

st: Fariyad Ka Maja Hai Lab Pe Rahe Khamoshi,
s:
Fariyad Ka Maja Hai Lab Pe Rahe Khamoshi,
Aankhe Yeh Kah Rahi Hain Fariyaad Kya Karen,

Mohabbat Ki Garmi Bhi Kya Cheej Hai,
Tabiyat Meri Kya Se Kya Ho Gayi,

Kahte Hain Isq Ka Anjaam Bura Hota Hai,
Ab Kuchh Bhi Ho Mohabbat Nibhani Hai Hamein…

st: Woh Naqab Lagakar Khud Ko,
s:
Woh Naqab Lagakar Khud Ko,
Ishq Se Mehfooz Samjhte Rahe,

Nadan Itna Bhi Nahi Samjhe,
Ishq Chere Se Nahi Nazron Se Hota Hai…

st: Log Isq Karte Hain,
s:
Log Isq Karte Hain,
Bade Shor Ke Saath,

Hamne Bhi Kiya,
Bade Jor Ke Saath,

Magar Ab Karenge Thoda,
Gour Ke Saath,

Kyonki Kal Usko Dekha,
Kisi Aur Ke Saath…

st: Kisi Ko Isq Ki Achhayi  Ne Maar Dala,
s:
Kisi Ko Isq Ki Achhayi  Ne Maar Dala,
Kisi Ko Isq Ki Gahrai  Ne Maar Dala,

Karke Isq Koi Na Bacha,
Jo Bach Gaya Use Tanhayi  Ne Maar Dala…

st: Khuda Jaane Ke Ab Kyon,
s:
Khuda Jaane Ke Ab Kyon,
Hum Se Na Pyar Karti Ho,

Milakar Aankh Gairon Se,
Hamein Intezar Karwaati Ho,

Gulaam Banke Husn Ko ,
Yun Na Salaam Karo,

Kiya Hai Isq Toh Isq Ko,
Badnaam Na Karo…

st: Mujhe Dard-E-Ishq Ka Mazaa Maloom Hai,
s:
Mujhe Dard-E-Ishq Ka Mazaa Maloom Hai,
Dard-E-Dil Ki Inteha Maloom Hai,

Zindagi Bhar Muskuraane Ki Dua Naa Dena,
Mujhe Pal Bhar Muskuraane Ki Sazaa Maloom Hai

Bichad Jaana Tu Us Ke Liye Maayane Nahin Rakhta,
Jafaon Ka Apni Hisaab Woh Zubaani Nahin Rakhta,

Rotaa Nahin Yaa Use Ronaa Nahin Aata,
Sungdil Hai Yaa Phir Aankhon Mein Paani Nahin Rakhta…

st: Log Kahte Hain Ki Ishq Itna Mat Karo,
s:
Log Kahte Hain Ki Ishq Itna Mat Karo,
Ki Hussan Sar Pe Sawar Ho Jaaye,
Hum Kahte Hai Ki Ishq Itna Karo,
Ki Patthar Dil Ko Bhi Tumse Pyaar Ho Jaaye…

st: Ishq mohabat tho hajro karte hai ,
s:
Ishq mohabat tho hajro karte hai ,
Gam E Judai se wo sabhi darte hai,

Ham thon a ishq karte hai na mohabat karte hai ,
Bas dosto k ek muskarhat pe marte hai…

st: Kiya Isqe E Kuda Mane Neegah kar Gaya Aur Koi,
s:
Kiya Isqe E Kuda Mane Neegah kar Gaya Aur Koi,
Kiya Husan E Jawa Mane Nakab Uda Gya Aur Koi…

st: Aisa nhi k tu hi ghayal hai teer-e-ishq se,
s:
Aisa nhi k tu hi ghayal hai teer-e-ishq se,
Jo aag udhar hai wo aag is dil ko bhi lagi hai,
Tujhe chahne ki tujhe poojne ki, tujh se nibhane ki,
Tere bin sans bhi rukne ki zidd karne lagi hai…

st: Bhar aayi meri aankhein jab uska naam aaya,
s:
Bhar aayi meri aankhein jab uska naam aaya,
Ishq naakam sahi fir bhi bahut kaam aaya,
Humne mohabbat mein aisi bhi guzaari raate,
Jab tak aansu na bahe dil ko na aaraam aaya…

st: Umar guzri isi kashmakash mein meri
s:
Umar guzri isi kashmakash mein meri
Kya hai koi jagah jahaan khuda nahi
Khud khudaa ne diya jawab iska
Shayad tujhko ishq kisi se hua nahi
Main to basta hoon har zarre mein o “Rajan”
Bas ek dil-e-husn hi hai jisme koi basta nahi…

st: Ishq Ki Aarzoo Ko Pura Karna Chahta Hun…
s:
Ishq Ki Aarzoo Ko Pura Karna Chahta Hun…
Nigahe Kahi Or Hoti Hai Lakin Har Tarf Tujhe Pata Hun…

Teri Khatir Dheron Galiyon Mein Bhi Akela Khada Hun,
Lekin Kuchh Bhi Bolo Janeman Mein Sirf Tujhe Chahta Hun…

st: Bus Ab Tujhe Hi Chahne Ko Jee Chahta H,
s:
Bus Ab Tujhe Hi Chahne Ko Jee Chahta H,
Teri Yaado Me Kho Jaane Ko Jee Chahta H,
Laga Di H Tumne Aisi Ishq Ki Aag,
K Usi Me Jal Jaane Ko Jee Chahta H,
Koi Bhi Kaam Me Ab Dil Lagta Nahi,
Bus Subah Shaam Tumhara Hi Intezaar Karne Ko Jee Chahta H,
Honge Na Hum Kabhi Tujh Se Juda,
Ab To Ye Kasam Khaane Ko Jee Chahta H…

st: Sach Ko Pehachanta Nahi Koi,
s:
Sach Ko Pehachanta Nahi Koi,
Wafai Ko Jaanta Nahi Koi,
Aur Ishq Mein Mer Jaye Koi,
Aisa Pyar Hota Hai, Maanta Nahi Koi…

st: Yeh Ishq Bhi Ek Ajeeb Ehsaas Hota Hai
s:
Yeh Ishq Bhi Ek Ajeeb Ehsaas Hota Hai
Alzafon Se Jyada Nigahon Se Byaan Hota Hai
Har Pal Bas Uske Gam Aur Khushi Ki Fikr Hoti Hai
Isi Ehsaas Se To Humko Jeene Ka Gumaan Hota Hai…

st: Dard Ne Kisi Ko Tadpaya Na Hota
s:
Dard Ne Kisi Ko Tadpaya Na Hota
Aankho Ne Kisi Ko Rulaya Na Hota
Khushi Hi Khushi Hoti Har Kisi Ke Paas
Agar Rab Ne Ishq Banaya Na Hota…

st: Rab Se Milunga To Aashiq Ki Tarah Shagird
s:
Rab Se Milunga To Aashiq Ki Tarah Shagird
Wallah Ibadat Se Mohabbat Ki Tajjali Ki Hai
Log Kehte Hain Ishq Karo Us Se
Jis Se Haseen Koi Or Na Ho Shagird
Main Apne “Rab” Sey Ishq Q Na Karun
Ke Us Se Haseen To Jannat Bhi Nahi…

st: Ruk Gaya Wo Waqt Ki Nishani Ban Ke
s:
Ruk Gaya Wo Waqt Ki Nishani Ban Ke
Beh Gaya Ek Din Aankh Ka Pani Ban Ke
Ajeeb Kashma-kash Ban Gayi Hai Zindagi
Ae Maut Tu Hi Mil Ja Ab Ishq Ki Nishani Ban Ke…

st: Sailaab Uth-ta Hai Kabhi Anjaani Zindagi Mei
s:
Sailaab Uth-ta Hai Kabhi Anjaani Zindagi Mei
To Bas Aapka Chehra Aankhon Ko Yaad Aata Hai
Ho Jaaye Aap Humse Khafa Kisi Mod Par
To Aap Par Na Jaane Kyun Kuch Jyada Hi Pyaar Aata Hai
Yeh Ishq Hai Ya Koi Nasa Humei Yeh To Nahin Maloom
Par Itna Jaante Hai Aapse Milkar Hi Rooh Ko Karaar Aata Hai…

st: Baarish Ki Boondon Ka Aapke Hothon Se Fisalna
s:
Baarish Ki Boondon Ka Aapke Hothon Se Fisalna
Dil Ko Ghayal Kar Jata Hai
Reshmi Julfon Mein Unka Sarakna
Dil Ko Bahut Lubhata Hai
Laakh Koshish Karta Hun Lekin
Humko Chain Kahan Aata Hai
Yahi To Mousam Hai Yaaron
Jab Ishq Jawaan Ho Jata Hai…..

st: Kitne Dil Fanaa Hue Teri Raah-E-Aashiqii Mein
s:
Kitne Dil Fanaa Hue Teri Raah-E-Aashiqii Mein
Daur-E-Bewafa Ka Sil Sila Mein Loot Gayee
Hui Badnaam Qasur-E-Ishq Mein Mohabbat Meri
Haal-E-Mahajuurii Mein Jaan Meri Niklati Gayee…

st: Ishq Ke Maayne Humse Mat Pucho
s:
Ishq Ke Maayne Humse Mat Pucho
Hum Bhi Is Se Anjaan Hain
Sirf Ek Guzarish Hai Ke Kabhi Door Na Jana
Kyonki Aapka Ishq Hi Hamari Jaan Hai…

st: Ek Jaam Mohabbat Ka Aankho Se Pila Dena
s:
Ek Jaam Mohabbat Ka Aankho Se Pila Dena
Mujhe Aaj Nahi To Kal Bhula Dena
Tere Ishq Se Aabad Hai Meri Duniya
Thukra Ke Mujhe Tum Kafir Bana Dena…

st: Ishq Paane Ki Tamanna Mein
s:
Ishq Paane Ki Tamanna Mein
Kabhi-Kabhi Jindagi Khilona Bankar Reh Jati Hai
Jise Dil Mein Basana Chahte Hain
Wo Surat Sirf Yaad Bankar Reh Jati Hai…

st: Armaano Ka Machalna To Dil Ki Aadat Hai
s:
Armaano Ka Machalna To Dil Ki Aadat Hai
Unme Rang Bharne Ki Har Kisi Ko Izazat Hai
Lafzon Mein Sanwarti Dhadkano Mein Basti
Yeh Ishq Bhi Ek Ajab Shararat Hai

st: Ishq Aur Dosti Meri Zindagi Ka Gumaan Hai
s:
Ishq Aur Dosti Meri Zindagi Ka Gumaan Hai
Ishq Meri Rooh Dosti Mera Imaan Hai
Ishq Pe Kardu Fida Apni Saari Zindagi
Magar Dosti Par Mera Ishq Bhi Kurbaan Hai

st: Ishq Ka Dariya Kitna Gehra Hai,
s:
Ishq Ka Dariya Kitna Gehra Hai,
Kareeb Se Dekho Usse Woh Sirf Dil Ko Sulgata Hai,
Kya Bebasi Mein Ab Woh Ishq Ko Samajhte,
Haalat Kuch Ab Milte Nahin Waqt Se,
‘Masroor’ Woh Saahil Dikhta Hai Apna Lekin Kinara Khisak Jaata Hai…

st: Nigahon Se Dil Mein Ghar Karke
s:
Nigahon Se Dil Mein Ghar Karke
Mere Khawabon Ki Haqiqat Ho Gaye Ho Tum
Ishq Ke Safar Ki Manzil Banke
Meri Bekhudi Ki Wahaj Ho Gaye Ho Tum…

st: Agar Hum Bhi Teri Tarah Majboor Na Hote
s:
Agar Hum Bhi Teri Tarah Majboor Na Hote
Khuda Kasam Hum Bhi Tumse Kabhi Door Na Hote
Wo To Tere Ishq Mein Hum Badnaam Ho Gaye
Warna Shayari Ki Duniya Mein Hum Kabhi Mashoor Na Hote…

st: Jazbat-E-Ishq Sab Ko Bataya Nahi Jata
s:
Jazbat-E-Ishq Sab Ko Bataya Nahi Jata
Lag Jata Hai Dil Lagaya Nahi Jata
Jannat Ki Baat Ho Ya Ho Gulistan Ke Rang
Dil Mein Lagi Aag Ko Bujhaya Nahi Jata

st: Mujhe Ye Aaj Batane Ki Ijazat Dedo
s:
Mujhe Ye Aaj Batane Ki Ijazat Dedo
Mujhe Ye Sham Sajane Ki Ijazat Dedo
Mujhe Kaid Kar Lo Apne Ishq Mein
Ye Jaan Tum Par Lootane Ki Ijazat Dedo

st: Dil Mein Basa Ek Naam Hai
s:
Dil Mein Basa Ek Naam Hai
Aapki Khusboo Tak Ki Mujhe Pehchaan Hai
Agar Tum Mere Na Ho Sake To Koi Gam Nahi
Ishq Mein Lutt Jana Aashiqon Ka Kaam Hai

st: Kya Hai Wafa E Mohabbat
s:
Kya Hai Wafa E Mohabbat
Teri Raah Dekhte Hain
Tere Ishq Mein Jeene Ki
Chaah Dekte Hain
Tujhse Hai Pyaar Sanam Dilo Jaan Se
Ab To Bs Teri Mohabbat Ka Paigaam Dekhte Hain

st: Pyase Ko Ek Katra Pani Kafi Hai
s:
Pyase Ko Ek Katra Pani Kafi Hai
Ishq Mein Char Pal Ki Zindgani Kafi Hai
Doobne Ko Samander Mein Jayein Kahan
Aapki Aankh Se Tapka Voh Pani Kafi Hai
